title: GodFather (Hindi)
writer: Lakshmi Bhupala, Murali Gopy, Mohan Raja
short_cast: Chiranjeevi, Salman Khan, Nayanthara, Satya Dev, Murli Sharma
cast: Chiranjeevi, Salman Khan, Nayanthara, Satya Dev, Murli Sharma
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: A political leader’s death leads to a power struggle. Amid corruption, greed and deceit, an unlikely opponent steps up.
